an10.68:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava nalakapane viharati palasavane.
an10.68:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava tadahuposathe bhikkhusanghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an10.68:1.3: Atha kho bhagava bahudeva rattim bhikkhunam dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva tunhibhutam tunhibhutam bhikkhusangham anuviloketva ayasmantam sariputtam amantesi:
an10.68:2.2: Patibhatu tam, sariputta, bhikkhunam dhammi katha.
an10.68:2.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma sariputto bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.68:3.1: Atha kho bhagava catuggunam sanghatim pannapetva dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappesi pade padam accadhaya sato sampajano utthanasannam manasi karitva.
an10.68:3.2: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.68:3.4: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an10.68:4.1: “Yassa kassaci, avuso, saddha natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hiri natthi …
an10.68:4.9: appamado natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa ya ratti va divaso va agacchati, haniyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.68:4.10: Seyyathapi, avuso, kalapakkhe candassa ya ratti va divaso va agacchati, hayateva vannena hayati mandalena hayati abhaya hayati arohaparinahena;
an10.68:4.11: evamevam kho, avuso, yassa kassaci saddha natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hiri natthi …
an10.68:4.19: appamado natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa ya ratti va divaso va agacchati, haniyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.68:5.1: Yassa kassaci, avuso, saddha atthi kusalesu dhammesu, hiri atthi …
an10.68:5.9: appamado atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa ya ratti va divaso va agacchati, vuddhiyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu no parihani.
an10.68:5.10: Seyyathapi, avuso, junhapakkhe candassa ya ratti va divaso va agacchati, vaddhateva vannena vaddhati mandalena vaddhati abhaya vaddhati arohaparinahena;
an10.68:5.11: evamevam kho, avuso, yassa kassaci saddha atthi kusalesu dhammesu …pe…
an10.68:5.12: appamado atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa ya ratti va divaso va agacchati, vuddhiyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu no parihani”ti.
